group_1.textLeft: Phew...@That tea was delicious!

group_1.textRight: I'm feeling all relaxed now.

group_1.textLeft: ...But you know, the main event of the@chocolate party is just getting started!

group_1.textRight: The best chocolate cake in the universe, was it?
Did you already give Mami her present?

group_1.textLeft: You betcha!

group_1.textRight: A magical chocolate cake...@I wonder what it tastes like?
Hey, hold up!
That's Mami's cake.
You aren't about to steal it from her, are you?

group_1.textLeft: It's not like that, but it was a@pretty big cake, wasn't it?
How's Mami gonna eat it all by herself?
I hadn't been planning to have@the whole thing by myself...

group_1.textRight: No, no, listen!
It's a special present from Nagisa to Mami...
So Mami should be the one to eat it!@Madoka, you agree with me, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: ...Who, me?
I think...well...
Mami and Nagisa made this cake together.
So, I suppose I was thinking that perhaps...
...Mami might give half of it to Nagisa.

group_1.textRight: That's what I was thinking too...
Nagisa didn't make it for herself to eat, did she?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that's true, but...
Speaking not as a chocolatier,@but as a chocolate-eater...
I'd love a taste of the best cake in the universe.

group_1.textRight: ...You're an honest one.
...Well, I guess we're all kind of divided on this.

group_1.textLeft: In that case, let's do it this way, shall we?
Since Nagisa gave it to me as a gift,
half the cake is mine.
As for the other half, we'll play@a game with it as the prize!

group_1.textRight: The prize...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, whoever wins the game will have the prize
of deciding what to do with@the other half of the cake.

group_1.textRight: What kind of game are we playing?

group_1.textLeft: Well...@How about a card game?

group_1.textRight: Oh, that sounds good!
When you say card game, are we talking@something like Fan Tan, or Memory?

group_1.textLeft: ...Does that mean the first one to go out wins?

group_1.textRight: That might go a bit fast...

group_1.textLeft: Well, if we're doing this, we might as@well liven things up a little.

group_1.textRight: ...In that case, whattaya say we use those@chocolate coins Nagisa brought as chips,
and play some poker?
Whoever comes out with the@most chocolate coins wins!
So the chocolate coins are@the replacement for poker chips...
And the prize for the winner is@half of Mami's chocolate cake.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah!

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: Nagisa doesn't really know the rules, though...

group_1.textRight: It's just some entertainment for the party.
Let's have fun while we learn together, okay?

group_1.textLeft: Got it!

group_1.narration: The party game over the best@chocolate cake in the universe has begun!
